Interface ISysMessageConstant

public interface ISysMessageConstant

The class ISysMessageConstant was written for the constants used with the ISysMessages.
Last modification $Date: 2006/03/17 17:53:59 $.

Version:
$Revision: 1.6 $
Author:
Herbert Helmstreit
